content:
Weinreb family

1 Berk WEINREB
 + Gitli 
  2x Dawid WEINREB                   1800
    + Riwka CYGLER                   1801
          married Jan 31, 1822 #17

     3x son WEINREB                  - 1836 #141

     3? child WEINREB                - 1840 #188
     3o Ewa WEINREB                  1843 #500
       * Wolf PRAGER                 May 3, 1841 #125

  2x Abraham WEINREB                 1807 - 1844 #115
    + Sora FRIEDNER                  1810 - 1841 #47

     3o Bajla WEINREB                1836 #477

    + Marya (Hanna) BERGER           1817
          married 1841 #46
     3o Jachwetta WEINREB            1842 #478
     3o Faigla WEINREB               Apr 28, 1844 #234 - 1844 #225




1 Abraham WEINREB
 + Gitli SZWARTZAPFEL
